mapper.insert: INSERT INTO data(dataNum, dataCode, title, writer, content, created) VALUES(#{dataNum}, #{dataCode}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM data d JOIN employee e ON d.writer = e.empNo JOIN dataGroup dg ON d.dataCode = dg.dataCode

SELECT d.dataNum, dg.dataType, e.name, title, created, NVL(fileCount, 0) fileCount, NVL(replyCount, 0) replyCount FROM data d JOIN employee e ON d.writer = e.empNo JOIN dataGroup dg ON d.dataCode = dg.dataCode LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT dataNum, COUNT(*) fileCount FROM dataFile GROUP BY dataNum ) f ON d.dataNum=f.dataNum LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT dataNum, COUNT(*) replyCount FROM dataReply WHERE answer=0 GROUP BY dataNum ) r ON d.dataNum=r.dataNum
ORDER BY commuNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO commuFile (fileNum, commuNum, originalFileName, saveFileName) VALUES (seq_commuFile.NEXTVAL, #{commuNum}, #{originalFilename}, #{saveFilename})
mapper.select: SELECT c.commuNum, cb.clubType, e.name, title, content, c.created, hitCount, NVL(commuLikeCount, 0) commuLikeCount FROM community c JOIN employee e ON c.writer = e.empNo JOIN club cb ON c.clubCode = cb.clubCode LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT commuNum, COUNT(*) commuLikeCount FROM commuLike GROUP BY commuNum ) cl ON c.commuNum = cl.commuNum WHERE c.commuNum = #{commuNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE community SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE commuNum = #{commuNum}
mapper.select:
SELECT commuNum, title FROM community c JOIN employee e ON c.writer = e.empNo JOIN club cb ON c.clubCode = cb.clubCode
AND (commuNum > #{commuNum})
ORDER BY commuNum ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT commuNum, title FROM community c JOIN employee e ON c.writer = e.empNo JOIN club cb ON c.clubCode = cb.clubCode
AND (commuNum < #{commuNum})
ORDER BY commuNum DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO commuReply (commuNum, replyNum, replyWriter, content, created, answer) VALUES (#{commuNum}, seq_commuReply.NEXTVAL, #{replyWriter}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{answer})
mapper.select: SELECT r.replyNum, e.name, content, r.created, NVL(answerCount, 0) answerCount, NVL(likeCount, 0) likeCount, NVL(disLikeCount, 0) disLikeCount FROM commuReply r JOIN employee e ON r.replyWriter = e.empNo LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT answer, COUNT(*) answerCount FROM commuReply WHERE answer!=0 GROUP BY answer ) a ON r.replyNum = a.answer LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT replyNum, COUNT(DECODE(replyLike, 1, 1)) likeCount, COUNT(DECODE(replyLike, 0, 1)) disLikeCount FROM commuReplyLike GROUP BY replyNum ) c ON r.replyNum = c.replyNum WHERE commuNum = #{commuNum} AND r.answer = 0 ORDER BY r.replyNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
SELECT replyNum, commuNum, name, content, created, answer FROM commuReply c JOIN employee e ON e.empNo = c.replyWriter WHERE answer= #{answer} ORDER BY replyNum DESC
